channel.title: Optimise architecture on Building Sustainable Solutions on Azure
channel.description: Recent content in Optimise architecture on Building Sustainable Solutions on Azure

item.title: Apply WAF practices
item.description: Directions Discuss the following questions: What does well-architected mean at Microsoft? What is the difference between Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) and Well Architected Framework (WAF)? What are the five pillars of Microsoft Azure Well-Architected framework? How does WAF contribute to a solution’s overall sustainability profile? As a team, perform an assessment of the team’s proposed solution architecture from Step 2 using the WAF assessment questions. Discuss the following questions: Are there any additional questions that should be part of the assessment, especially when it comes to building sustainable practices?

item.title: Checklist
item.description: As a team, you should have the following slides: Confirmation that the proposed solution is following best practices and patterns. Description of how this confirmation is done.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure Azure Well Architected Framework Azure Well Architected Review Assessment
